tier.name: Applied Systems
tier.description: Proof methodology works at scale and on rebrands

collectionCopy.title: Applied Systems
collectionCopy.subtitle: Protocols transformed by real constraints
collectionCopy.introduction: Here's where theory meets constraint. Each project takes a protocol and proves it works when reality pushes back—through brand evolution, organizational change, or scaling pressure.

aiden-jae.title: Aiden Jae: Retail Brand Architecture
aiden-jae.summary: A jewelry e-commerce system where brand story becomes operational advantage. 'Accessible luxury' isn't a tagline—it's encoded into photography, Shopify UX, product grid logic. Visual texture proves ethical sourcing. Structure makes narrative visible.
aiden-jae.drift: Disconnected visual language failing to communicate luxury and craftsmanship integrity in digital environment
aiden-jae.scaffold: From-scratch design system integrating high-resolution photography with custom Liquid templates and CSS framework
aiden-jae.fidelity: Premium positioning established as operational advantage—structure proving authenticity rather than marketing claiming it

image.alt: Aiden Jae jewelry e-commerce showing texture-led product photography and custom layout system
image.caption: Photography and code as unified system—texture becomes brand truth

encore.title: Encore: Architectural Sovereignty
encore.summary: 12 years. 40,000+ users. 2.5 million annual transactions. 99.9% uptime. Zero unplanned outages. A desktop-era platform evolved to modern standards through incremental transformation—never pausing operations, never breaking the system.
encore.drift: Legacy desktop logic failing to scale to modern web standards and user expectations
encore.scaffold: Custom SCSS framework and .NET Core UI migration enabling layer-by-layer modernization without disrupting 24/7 operations
encore.fidelity: 12 years sovereignty, zero service interruption—architectural integrity proved through continuous operation under transformation

image.alt: Encore enterprise platform interface showing modernized design system layered on legacy infrastructure
image.caption: Incremental refactoring: transformation while running, not after

modernist-homestead.title: Modernist Homestead: Zero-Willpower Systems
modernist-homestead.summary: Household systems engineering for a neurodivergent family managing ADHD, autism, and celiac disease across international relocation—culinary modularity, executive function scaffolding, health integration.
modernist-homestead.drift: Willpower-dependent processes fail when executive function is disrupted by ADHD, autism, health constraints, or geographic relocation
modernist-homestead.scaffold: Culinary modularity + executive function scaffolding + health navigation infrastructure integrating five cuisine traditions, celiac protocols, and portable medical continuity
modernist-homestead.fidelity: Family operates successfully across relocation and health challenges—proof that structural discipline replaces willpower dependency

image.alt: Modernist Homestead kitchen system showing modular culinary and health infrastructure
image.caption: Zero-willpower systems: the environment does the thinking

modernist-homestead.discipline: Household Systems, Neurodivergent Design, Culinary Architecture

everyday-gold.title: Everyday Gold: E-Commerce Operations
everyday-gold.summary: Natural deodorant direct-to-consumer brand where regulatory compliance becomes design material and premium positioning emerges from architectural honesty rather than marketing.
everyday-gold.drift: Handmade quality vs. digital scalability in direct-to-consumer commerce—regulatory requirements competing with aspirational brand messaging
everyday-gold.scaffold: E-commerce infrastructure + inventory management + modular scent-variant system with regulatory material as design material
everyday-gold.fidelity: Sustainable sourcing becomes structural operational advantage—compliance architecture proves authenticity

image.alt: Everyday Gold label system showing circular die-cut design with integrated regulatory information
image.caption: Regulatory material as brand material—honesty becomes premium positioning

altrueism.title: Altrueism: Brand Remediation
altrueism.summary: Nonprofit identity and platform system where transparency becomes structural rather than aspirational—visual language proving rather than claiming organizational integrity.
altrueism.drift: Incoherent brand vs. mission-driven positioning—visual system failing to support transparent operations
altrueism.scaffold: Complete identity system, digital platform, messaging hierarchy with hand-made marks as operational proof of transparency
altrueism.fidelity: Transformed incoherent brand into premium-positioned system—structure proving transparency rather than marketing claiming it

image.alt: Altrueism identity system showing hand-made marks and rigorous typography conveying structural transparency
image.caption: Transparency as structure, not marketing—hand-made marks prove honesty

altrueism.discipline: Brand Architecture, Non-profit Design, Visual Systems
